mapper.sql: id, p_level, p_method, pro_z_name, pro_name, department_id, remark, pz_no, pz_date1, p_date, p_uid, del_date, uid
mapper.insert: insert into official_info (id, p_level, p_method, pro_z_name, pro_name, department_id, remark, pz_no, pz_date1, p_date, p_uid, del_date, uid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proZName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pzNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pzDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into official_info
id,
p_level,
p_method,
pro_z_name,
pro_name,
department_id,
remark,
pz_no,
pz_date1,
p_date,
p_uid,
del_date,
uid,

mapper.update:
update official_info
p_level = #{pLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p_method = #{pMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_z_name = #{proZName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pz_no = #{pzNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pz_date1 = #{pzDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
p_date = #{pDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
p_uid = #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update official_info set p_level = #{pLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_method = #{pMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_z_name = #{proZName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pz_no = #{pzNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pz_date1 = #{pzDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p_date = #{pDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p_uid = #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id , p_level, p_method, pro_z_name, pro_name, department_id , remark, pz_no, STR_TO_DATE(pz_date1,'%Y-%m-%d') pz_date1, p_date, p_uid, del_date, uid from official_info where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
